Deprecated API

  • Deprecated Packages 
    Package and Description
    org.gradle.sonar.runner
    The 'sonar-runner' been superseded by the official plugin from SonarQube, please see: http://docs.sonarqube.org/display/SONAR/Analyzing+with+Gradle
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.ConflictResolution
    org.gradle.api.tasks.ConventionValue
    Use Closure or Callable instead.
    org.gradle.api.file.DeleteAction
    Use DeleteSpec or Delete instead.
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.Module
    org.gradle.plugins.javascript.rhino.worker.RhinoWorker
    org.gradle.plugins.javascript.rhino.worker.RhinoWorkerHandleFactory
    org.gradle.platform.base.test.TestSuiteBinarySpec
    Use TestSuiteBinarySpec instead.
    org.gradle.platform.base.test.TestSuiteContainer
    Use TestSuiteContainer instead.
    org.gradle.platform.base.test.TestSuiteSpec
    Use instead.

    Class and Description
    org.gradle.api.tasks.javadoc.AntGroovydoc
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.AntScalaDoc
    org.gradle.BuildExceptionReporter
    org.gradle.BuildLogger
    org.gradle.BuildResultLogger
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.EclipseDomainModel
    org.gradle.plugins.javascript.rhino.worker.RhinoWorkerUtils
    org.gradle.sonar.runner.SonarProperties
    The 'sonar-runner' plugin has been superseded by the official plugin from SonarQube, please see: http://docs.sonarqube.org/display/SONAR/Analyzing+with+Gradle
    org.gradle.sonar.runner.tasks.SonarRunner
    The 'sonar-runner' plugin has been superseded by the official plugin from SonarQube, please see: http://docs.sonarqube.org/display/SONAR/Analyzing+with+Gradle
    org.gradle.sonar.runner.SonarRunnerExtension
    The 'sonar-runner' plugin has been superseded by the official plugin from SonarQube, please see: http://docs.sonarqube.org/display/SONAR/Analyzing+with+Gradle
    org.gradle.sonar.runner.plugins.SonarRunnerPlugin
    The 'sonar-runner' plugin has been superseded by the official plugin from SonarQube, please see: http://docs.sonarqube.org/display/SONAR/Analyzing+with+Gradle

    The 'sonar-runner' plugin has been superseded by the official plugin from SonarQube, please see: http://docs.sonarqube.org/display/SONAR/Analyzing+with+Gradle
    org.gradle.TaskExecutionLogger
    org.gradle.api.tasks.bundling.Zip.ZipCopyActionImpl
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    org.gradle.platform.base.BinaryType
    Use ComponentType instead.

    Use ComponentType instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.gradle.api.logging.Logging.ANT_IVY_2_SLF4J_LEVEL_MAPPER
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.gradle.api.specs.Specs.and(Collection>)
    Use Specs.intersect(Collection) instead.
    org.gradle.api.specs.Specs.and(Spec...)
    Use Specs.intersect(Spec[]) instead.
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoTaskExtension.getAgent()
    Agent should be considered final.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.getAnnotations()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.ScalaCompileOptions.getDaemonServer()
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.ProjectDependency.getDeclaredConfigurationName()
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.AbstractLibrary.getDeclaredConfigurationName()
    org.gradle.tooling.model.idea.IdeaModuleDependency.getDependencyModule()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.bundling.Zip.getEncoding()
    Use Zip.getMetadataCharset() instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.getJAVADOC_ANNOTATIONS()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.getJavadocAnnotations()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.getJDK_ANNOTATIONS()
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoPluginExtension.getLogger()
    logger should be considered final.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.javadoc.Groovydoc.getOverview()
    please use Groovydoc.getOverviewText() instead
    org.gradle.StartParameter.getParallelThreadCount()
    Use getMaxWorkerCount or isParallelProjectExecutionEnabled instead.
    org.gradle.tooling.model.Task.getProject()
    Do not use this method. It is assumed that the caller already has a reference to owning project.
    org.gradle.tooling.model.eclipse.EclipseProjectDependency.getTargetProject()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.getTestResources()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.Test.getTestSrcDirs()
    Support for TestNG Javadoc annotations will be removed in Gradle 3.0
    org.gradle.StartParameter.isColorOutput()
    org.gradle.api.logging.configuration.LoggingConfiguration.isColorOutput()
    Use LoggingConfiguration.getConsoleOutput() instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.ScalaCompileOptions.isFork()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.isJavadocAnnotations()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.ScalaCompileOptions.isUseAnt()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.ScalaCompileOptions.isUseCompileDaemon()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.javadocAnnotations()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.jdkAnnotations()
    org.gradle.api.specs.Specs.not(Spec)
    Use Specs.negate(Spec) instead.
    org.gradle.api.specs.Specs.or(boolean, List>)
    Use Specs.union(Collection) instead.
    org.gradle.api.specs.Specs.or(Collection>)
    Use Specs.union(Collection) instead.
    org.gradle.api.specs.Specs.or(Spec...)
    Use Specs.union(Spec[]) instead.
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoTaskExtension.setAgent(JacocoAgentJar)
    Agent should be considered final.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.setAnnotationsOnSourceCompatibility(JavaVersion)
    org.gradle.StartParameter.setColorOutput(boolean)
    org.gradle.api.logging.configuration.LoggingConfiguration.setColorOutput(boolean)
    Use LoggingConfiguration.setConsoleOutput(ConsoleOutput) instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.ScalaCompileOptions.setDaemonServer(String)
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.AbstractLibrary.setDeclaredConfigurationName(String)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.bundling.Zip.setEncoding(String)
    Use Zip.setMetadataCharset(String) instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.ScalaCompileOptions.setFork(boolean)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.setJavadocAnnotations(boolean)
    org.gradle.api.logging.LoggingManager.setLevel(LogLevel)
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoPluginExtension.setLogger(Logger)
    logger should be considered final.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.javadoc.Groovydoc.setOverview(String)
    please use Groovydoc.setOverviewText(TextResource) instead
    org.gradle.StartParameter.setParallelThreadCount(int)
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPluginConvention.setProject(ProjectInternal)
    Project should be considered final.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.testng.TestNGOptions.setTestResources(List)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.Test.setTestSrcDirs(List)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.ScalaCompileOptions.setUseAnt(boolean)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.ScalaCompileOptions.setUseCompileDaemon(boolean)
    org.gradle.api.java.archives.Manifest.writeTo(Writer)

    Constructor and Description
